answers.answer: Sounds like a neck problem. I suffered for years until they found I had some bad disc's in my neck had surgery in 1986 still doing good sometimes if I lift to heavy or lift wrong it gets stiff but not the pain I had before the surgery...

What comes to mind is a neck or upper back injury causing the pain in the head and neck and it may be pinching on  a nerve that is causing calf pain. An MRI of the upper back/neck might be in order. I know my back pain radiates down the back of my leg and calf. It is just a thought. I'm not sure why antibiotics will make your pain worse. I hope you can at least get something for pain in the interim. Do antiinflammatories work on you?

thank you for your answers , i always believed the pain was coming from my upper back/neck , but hey the docs are not interested, and no , i cannot take anti inflammatories , because they dont mix with my diabetes pills
